name: UAC Bypass Using DismHost
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using DismHost DLL hijacking (UACMe 63)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.parent.executable:*C\:\\Users\\* AND process.parent.executable:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* AND process.parent.executable:*\\DismHost.exe* AND winlog.event_data.IntegrityLevel:(High OR System))`
